thread.title: Iain Duncan Smith: The objective is simple, to leave the EU
thread.title_full: Iain Duncan Smith: The objective is simple, to leave the EU

title: Iain Duncan Smith: The objective is simple, to leave the EU
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Iain Duncan Smith: The objective is simple, to leave the EU 4 January 2017 Last updated at 09:36 GMT 
Former conservative leader Iain Duncan Smith has told the Today programme the government absolutely knows its objective in Brexit negotiations and that is to leave the European Union. 
Reacting to the resignation of the UK's ambassador to the EU, Sir Ivan Rogers, Mr Duncan Smith said the government needed civil servants they could trust to be in position for Brexit negotiations.
